policies.involuntary_refund:
Your request is eligible under Air Tanzania’s refund policy, subject to fare rules and proof of purchase.

**Involuntary Refunds:**
• Allowed for canceled flights, missed connections, or skipped destinations.
• Full refund if unused; partial refund equals the unused portion.
policies.involuntary_reissue:
Your request may be eligible under Air Tanzania’s reissue policy.

**Voluntary Reissues:**
• Changes allowed if permitted by fare rules.
• Fare difference and change fee apply.

**Medical / Bereavement:**
• Change penalties may be waived upon valid hospital invoice or death certificate.
• Applies to the passenger and immediate family members on the same PNR.
• Fare differences and taxes still apply.

**Force Majeure / Illness:**
• Ticket validity may be extended up to 3 months with valid medical documentation.
• Travel must resume from interruption point.
policies.voluntary_refund:
• Permitted per fare rules. Unused ticket: refund minus fees. Partial use: difference refunded minus fees.

**Lost Ticket / Special Cases:**
• Lost ticket refunds require ID and proof; processed post-validity with admin fee.
• Refunds due to death or hospitalization require supporting certificates.

**Timeframes by Payment Method:**
• Cash: 21 days minimum
• Card: 5 working days
• Mobile (M-Pesa/TigoPesa): 5 days (full), 21 days (partial)
• Wire Transfer: 21 working days

**Submission Requirements:**
• Refund requests must include PNR or ticket number, reason, ID, and bank details.
• Tickets booked via agent must be refunded through the issuing agent.
• Promo fares are non-refundable.
policies.medical_refund:
Waiver codes are not publicly listed but may be granted in the following scenarios:
• Passenger or immediate family death (certified proof required)
• Hospitalization of the traveler (medical invoice + certificate)

Waiver approval is at the airline’s discretion. Fare difference, taxes, and surcharges remain payable.
policies.name_change:
Air Tanzania permits **name corrections of up to three letters only** after ticketing.
• For changes beyond three letters or full name change, the ticket must be refunded and rebooked.
• Tickets are non-transferable and identity must match travel documents.
• No-show status may apply if ticket is used by an incorrect name.
policies.group_booking:
Group bookings are accepted for 10+ passengers sharing at least one flight segment.

**Key Terms:**
• Response within 3 working days from Group Desk
• Fares vary by season; no child/senior discounts
• 3-letter max name change post-ticketing
• Changes post-ticketing incur fees and fare difference
• Deposits required within 5–14 days; non-refundable if canceled within 31–89 days of travel
• Stopover fees may apply based on fare
• Tour conductor incentives available upon request
• Group seats not ticketed on time may face penalties
policies.infant_policy:
• Infants (<2 yrs) travel on lap at 10% of adult fare
• 1 infant allowed per adult
• Infant checked baggage allowance: 10 kg
• Children 2–11 yrs require separate seat; reduced fare applies
• Children turning 12 during trip must be booked as adults
• Child fare includes full adult baggage allowance
policies.baggage_policy:
• Infants: 10 kg checked baggage
• Children on child fare: same baggage as adults
• Max weight per bag: 32 kg — overweight bags must be repacked
• Baggage claims: 7 days (damage), 21 days (delay/loss)
• Delayed over 24h: eligible for First Needs Allowance — USD 50 (intl), USD 30 (domestic); must present ID, tag, PIR, and boarding pass
• Dangerous items, valuables, and electronics must not be packed in checked baggage
• Lost & found claims require timely submission; baggage not claimed in 3 months may be discarded
policies.seat_request_policy:
Seat assignments may be adjusted for operational or safety reasons.
• Children must sit in the same or adjacent row as accompanying adult
• No specific meal or seat preference policy published
• Wheelchair and medical needs should be requested during booking
policies.short_term_cancellation_policy:
Air Tanzania permits cancellations **within 24 hours of booking** with:
• Full refund
• No penalty, provided flight has not departed
• Applies regardless of fare type

support_contacts._note: For internal use only. Do not include in autoresponse emails.
